    ktk.dev module¶

    Provide fonctions related to development, tests and release of ktk.

    Note

    This module is addressed to ktk developers only.

    Functions:

    build_tutorials()

    Build the markdown from notebooks tutorials.

    build_website([clean])

    Build the website using sphinx.

    clean()

    Delete temporary files that were used by the release process.

    compile_for_pypi()

    Compile for PyPi.

    release()

    Run all functions for release, without packaging and uploading.

    run_doc_tests()

    Run all doc tests.

    run_static_type_checker()

    Run static typing checker (mypy).

    run_unit_tests()

    Run all unit tests.

    upload_to_pypi()

    Upload to PyPi.
    ktk.dev.build_tutorials()¶

    Build the markdown from notebooks tutorials.

    Return type

    None

    ktk.dev.build_website(clean=False)¶

    Build the website using sphinx.

    Set clean to True to make clean beforehand.

    Return type

    None

    ktk.dev.clean()¶

    Delete temporary files that were used by the release process.

    Return type

    None

    ktk.dev.compile_for_pypi()¶

    Compile for PyPi.

    Return type

    None

    ktk.dev.release()¶

    Run all functions for release, without packaging and uploading.

    Return type

    None

    ktk.dev.run_doc_tests()¶

    Run all doc tests.

    Return type

    None

    ktk.dev.run_static_type_checker()¶

    Run static typing checker (mypy).

    Return type

    None

    ktk.dev.run_unit_tests()¶

    Run all unit tests.

    Return type

    None

    ktk.dev.upload_to_pypi()¶

    Upload to PyPi. Only works on macOS for now.

    Return type

    None
